data: It was in Warwick Castle that I came across the curious stranger whom I am going to talk about.
"It was in Warwick Castle that I came across the curious stranger whom I am going to talk about."
“It was in Warwick Castle that I came across the curious stranger whom I am going to talk about.”
A Connecticut Yankee in King Arthur's Court, Part 1.
